CmdLine: apk --update --no-cache add          git cmake build-base python flex bison         graphviz ttf-freefont         make         ghostscript         texmf-dist         texmf-dist-latexextra         texmf-dist-langgreek         texlive         texlive-luatex &&     cd /root &&     git clone https://github.com/doxygen/doxygen.git &&     git config --global user.email "jtraulle@opencomp.fr" &&     git config --global user.name "Jean Traullé" &&     cd doxygen &&     git checkout tags/Release_1_8_17 -b Release_1_8_17 &&     mkdir build &&     cd build &&     cmake -G "Unix Makefiles" .. &&     make &&     make install &&     cd /home &&     apk del git cmake build-base python flex bison &&     rm -rf /root/doxygen
Commands.Name: run
